snippet: At C.E.S., the world's biggest computer chip maker, Intel, made it clear it plans to pour a lot of money and effort into turning ultrabooks into the next big computing phenomenon.
abstract: At C.E.S., the world's biggest computer chip maker, Intel, made it clear it plans to pour a lot of money and effort into turning ultrabooks into the next big computing phenomenon.

headline.main: Intel Pushes MacBook Air-Like Notebooks, but for Windows
headline.print_headline: Intel Pushes MacBook Air-Like Notebooks, but for Windows
